Docs.summary: Provides a string that describes an application settings property group. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An application settings class, derived from <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>, defines one or more properties that belong to the same application property group. <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsGroupDescriptionAttribute> is an optional attribute that you can use to provide descriptive text for a settings property group. This text is intended to assist both design-time tools and administrative run-time tools in identifying and describing the associated property group.
> [!NOTE] > This attribute can only be applied at the wrapper class level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Although the theoretical maximum length of the `description` parameter is constrained by the upper bounds of an <xref:System.Int32>, practical limits, determined by usability and quota limitations imposed by the settings provider, will be much smaller.
